How to Get Voter Data in West Virginia

How to Get Voter Data in West Virginia

November 17, 2025 west-virginia voter-data voter-list voter-history

West Virginia provides access to voter registration data and voter history through a flexible pricing model. You can purchase the voter list for $500 and voter history for $500 separately, or choose a $1,000 annual subscription that includes both files with updates throughout the year.

Quick Summary

Category Details
Voter List Cost $500 (one-time)
Voter History Cost $500 (one-time)
Subscription Cost $1,000 (annual with updates)
Access Method Mail-in request form
Voter History Access Available separately or with subscription
Delivery Method Email or cloud storage
Processing Time After form and payment received

Voter List

West Virginia provides voter registration data through the Secretary of State’s office via a mail-in request form.

How to Access

  1. Visit the West Virginia Elections page
  2. Download the Voter Data Request Form PDF
  3. Complete the request form
  4. Select your purchase option:
    • Voter list only ($500)
    • Voter list + voter history ($1,000 one-time)
    • Annual subscription ($1,000 with updates)
  5. Mail the form with payment to the address specified
  6. Receive data via email or cloud storage

What’s Included

The voter registration file includes information for all registered voters in West Virginia.

Voter History

West Virginia provides voter history as a separate file that can be purchased independently or with the voter list.

Access Options

Option Voter List Voter History Updates Cost
List Only ✓ ✗ No $500
History Only ✗ ✓ No $500
Both (One-Time) ✓ ✓ No $1,000
Subscription ✓ ✓ Yes $1,000/year

Historical Coverage

Contact the Secretary of State for details about the historical coverage period included in the Master Voter History List Export.

Cost

West Virginia offers flexible pricing options:

One-Time Purchases:

  • Voter List: $500
  • Voter History: $500
  • Both Files: $1,000

Annual Subscription: $1,000

  • Voter list included
  • Voter history included
  • Updates provided throughout the year

Subscription vs. One-Time Purchase

The subscription model offers significant value if you need current data:

Subscription Advantages ($1,000/year):

  • Same price as buying both files once
  • Receive updates throughout the year
  • Maintain current voter data
  • Get both voter history and registration updates

One-Time Purchase ($500-$1,000):

  • Snapshot of data at purchase time
  • No updates
  • Lower cost if you only need one file
  • Suitable for historical analysis

Delivery Methods

West Virginia provides voter data via:

  • Email: Data files sent via email
  • Cloud storage: Access files via cloud storage link

This flexible delivery approach accommodates different file sizes and user preferences.

Restrictions and Permitted Uses

Important Legal Requirement:

“No voter registration lists or data files containing voter names, addresses or other information derived from voter data files may be used for commercial or charitable solicitations or advertising, sold or reproduced for resale.”

Prohibited Uses

  • Commercial solicitations
  • Charitable solicitations
  • Advertising
  • Selling data
  • Reproducing data for resale

When requesting West Virginia voter data, users must comply with these restrictions and other state laws regarding the use of voter registration records.

Technical Notes

Flexible File Options

West Virginia’s pricing structure provides flexibility:

  • Buy only what you need
  • Start with one file, add the other later
  • Choose subscription if you need updates

Update Program

The $1,000 annual subscription provides updates “throughout the year.” Contact the Secretary of State to confirm:

  • Update frequency
  • How updates are delivered
  • What triggers an update (monthly, quarterly, on-demand, etc.)

Form Name

The request form includes an option for the “Master Voter History List Export” which is the voter history file.

Testing Status

This system has not been independently tested. Contact the West Virginia Secretary of State for current information about:

  • Processing timelines
  • Payment methods
  • Delivery methods
  • File formats
  • Subscription update frequency
  • Voter history coverage period

Contact Information

West Virginia Secretary of State - Elections Division

  • Website: https://sos.wv.gov/elections
  • Request Form: Voter Data Request

West Virginia’s flexible voter data system offers excellent value through multiple purchase options. The $1,000 annual subscription provides both voter registration and history with updates throughout the year at the same price as a one-time purchase of both files. The clear prohibition on commercial and charitable solicitation ensures data is used for appropriate political and election-related purposes.
